name: Dhaka University
admissionProcess: Admissions are open from June to August. Applicants must submit their academic records and pass an entrance examination.

events.title: Orientation Day
events.description: An event to welcome new students and introduce them to campus life.

events.title: Career Fair
events.description: A job fair to connect students with potential employers.

researchWorks.title: Advancements in Renewable Energy
researchWorks.description: A research paper exploring the latest innovations in renewable energy technologies.

researchWorks.title: Artificial Intelligence and Healthcare
researchWorks.description: A study on the applications of AI in the healthcare industry.

sports.schedule: Practice on Mondays and Wednesdays at 4 PM.
Practice on Tuesdays and Thursdays at 5 PM.

name: Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology
admissionProcess: Admissions are based on the national entrance exam for engineering colleges.

events.title: Tech Fest
events.description: A technical festival showcasing student projects and innovations.

events.title: Coding Competition
events.description: A coding competition for students to demonstrate their programming skills.

researchWorks.title: Internet of Things in Smart Cities
researchWorks.description: A research study exploring IoT applications in urban environments.

researchWorks.title: Cybersecurity Challenges in the Digital Age
researchWorks.description: A paper analyzing the evolving cybersecurity threats and solutions.

sports.schedule: Practice on Wednesdays and Fridays at 3 PM.
Practice on Tuesdays and Thursdays at 6 PM.

name: Jahangirnagar University
admissionProcess: Applicants must submit their portfolio and attend an interview with the admissions committee.

events.title: Annual Art Exhibition
events.description: An exhibition showcasing artworks of students and faculty.

events.title: Creative Writing Workshop
events.description: A workshop to enhance students' creative writing skills.

researchWorks.title: Exploring Art Therapy
researchWorks.description: A research study on the therapeutic benefits of art.

researchWorks.title: The Role of Art in Social Change
researchWorks.description: A paper discussing how art can influence societal change.

sports.schedule: Practice on Mondays and Thursdays at 6 AM.
Practice on Tuesdays and Fridays at 4 PM.
